responsibilities: Support product development efforts ranging from generative AI and machine learning application development and deployment to model development and monitoring, ML management, and DevOps.
Contribute to a Software Engineering team that supports production applications and helps develop new features and models.
Interface with internal and external stakeholders to ensure delivery of workable solutions that meet customer requirements and technical capabilities.
Drive the end-to-end model development lifecycle, ensuring reproducible research and well-managed software delivery.
Collaborate with a cross-functional team, sharing information and partnering effectively with colleagues globally.
Mentor teammates and work closely with product teams to integrate and deploy work into production environments.
Translate complex business problems into projects with clearly defined scope and deliver timely, well-managed deliverables.
Foster innovative ideas to solve real-world challenges and iterate on improvements rapidly.
Communicate proactively and compellingly to both technical and non-technical audiences.
Lead the adoption of AI across the enterprise.
qualifications: Solid software engineering skills and experience.
Experience in designing, developing, and implementing machine learning models and algorithms.
Ability to manage uncertainty and ambiguity in problem statements and paths to success.
Strong communication and data-driven decision-making skills.
Experience developing libraries and APIs for others to use.
Familiarity with NLP/CV libraries such as PyTorch, TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, spaCy, HuggingFace Transformers/Diffusers, OpenAI, LangChain, Semantic Kernel & OpenCV.
Experience using Cloud solutions (AWS, Azure, etc.) for building and deploying applications.
Experience in a fast-paced, agile environment.
analysis:
The job responsibilities include supporting product development efforts related to generative AI and machine learning application development, which directly indicates involvement with Generative AI. Additionally, the role involves driving the end-to-end model development lifecycle and leading the adoption of AI across the enterprise, further suggesting a focus on AI technologies.

In terms of skills, the job requires familiarity with NLP (Natural Language Processing) libraries such as HuggingFace Transformers, OpenAI, and LangChain, which are commonly used for working with language models and generative AI. The mention of these specific libraries and frameworks strongly indicates that the job involves working with language models and generative AI technologies.

Overall, both the responsibilities and skills clearly point towards involvement with Generative AI and language models.
